features: Expert Repairing Formula: L'Oreal Paris Elvive Total Repair 5 Repairing Shampoo and Conditioner set for silky, healthy, stronger, supple, and easy to style hair* *with system
Caring Ingredients: Formulated with caring ingredients, featuring up to 9 percent Repair Concentrate with Protein for silky, healthy-looking hair
Indulgent Experience: Neither too rich nor too light, Total Repair 5 Repairing Shampoo and Repairing Conditioner create a perfect synergy of intense care without the weigh down
Irresistable Fragrance: L'Oreal Paris Elvive Total Repair 5’s offers a sophisticated floral, creamy blend with juicy green notes
Complete Repairing Systen: Maximize results by using with the L'Oreal Paris Elvive Total Repair 5 Power Restore Multi-Use Treatment
body.description: L'Oreal Paris Total Repair 5 shampoo and conditioner helps repair the five visible signs of damaged hair - split ends, weak, rough, dull and dehydrated. The results? 1) Rebuilt fibers 2) Strength 3) vitality 4) silkiness and 5) Shine. Our strengthening system with protein + Ceramide helps fortify each strand, reinforcing hair fiber and sealing-in nourishment. For best results, use L'Oreal Paris Total Repair 5 shampoo and conditioner together. When using complete system of shampoo, conditioner, and treatment. Packaging may vary, what you receive may not be what is reflected on site.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: L’Oréal calculation based in part on data reported by NielsenIQ through its Scantrack Service for the Damage/Repair benefit in the Hair Care category for the 52 weeks ending 10/23/22 time period. Copyright 2022, Nielsen Consumer LLC

ELVIVE TOTAL REPAIR 5 HAIR THAT'S WORTH IT, IS WORTH REPAIRING. L'Oreal Paris Elvive Total Repair 5 strengthening system of shampoo, conditioner, and treatments feature a repair concentrate with protein delivering intense care without the weigh down for silky, healthy looking hair that feels light, is stronger, supple and easy to style. This hair-transforming range offers a sophisticated scent with a floral, creamy blend. From Elvive, the #1 brand in repair*.

UP TO 9% REPAIR CONCENTRATE WITH PROTEIN EXPERT REPAIRING FORMULA Hair is mostly made-up of protein. When damaged, it loses vital strength and nourishment. Our system features Repair Concentrate with protein to repair & reinforce strength for silky, healthy-looking hair

Caring Formula Total Repair 5 Repairing Shampoo & Conditioner create a perfect synergy combining intense care with lightness Sophisticated Scent Indulge in this sophisticated floral creamy blend with juicy green notes Sustainable Packaging Total Repair 5 Repairing Shampoo & Conditioner bottles are made from 94% recycled plastic* #1 Brand in Repair From Elvive, #1 brand in repair* in the US

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used to use really expensive salon shampoo and conditioner. But when my income dropped, I had to find something more affordable. I tried many products, wasted alot of money as well, until I found Loreal shampoo and conditioner. No, it's not salon quality, but it's the closest I've found on a tight budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Insane deal for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: A lot off people done know that L'Oréal is actually produced by the same manufacturers as the big expensive brands. This shampoo is no exception. It smells salon good and is thick and rich great for men or women. The smell reminds me of an expensive salon, it's truly invigorating! It is the smell of luxury and quality that will last all day. Make sure that you properly rinse your hair out if using the conditioner, it can be a bit heavy for men with short hair. Overall this is a solid "W"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love that I can buy this online. I’ve use this brand for years. That being said, finding these on Amazon makes my physical in store shopping list a little be easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have fine hair and have been trying to find a good shampoo and conditioner for a couple of years after one i previously used was discontinued. This lathers so well and my hair feels very clean after shampoo, but not dry or stringy. The conditioner makes my hair feel super soft. I've been using this for a few months now and I do feel that my hair is healthier and more moisturized. As mentioned, I have fine hair and this definitely isn't doing anything for volume, but I'd rather have it feel and look healthy and add my own volume.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My damaged hair is so soft now
reviews.reviewText: You feel the results after you wash the conditioner, my hair is so soft and shiny. It feels like it’s gotten longer.Was hoping it would help with hair loss but it doesn’t improve it otherwise still great for soft smooth hair

reviews.reviewerName: Están súper bonitas, fácil para armar abanicos.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Deja mi pelo muy limpio y con un buen olor, y por el precio la cantidad que trae es excelente.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It makes my hair soft
reviews.reviewText: What a great deal 2 large bottles and literally after just using the shampoo my hair is so soft and I use a lot of products when I wear my hair curly. Buy it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The best conditioner I’ve ever used. Better than very expensive brands. Repairs hair after bleaching
Excelente producto, ya tengo tiempo que lo uso y lo seguiré buscando definitivamente

reviews.reviewTitle: DEJA EL CABELLO SUPER SUAVE SIN ACONDICIONADOR
reviews.reviewText: huele muy bien, deja el cabello con brillo y suave aun sin acondicionador, mi detalle fue con el empacado,venia en una caja mas grande y con el movimiento se golpeo la botella y se quebro el dispensador..de ahi en fuera el producto es bueno.
